text: Samuel Aruwan (born 10 May 1982) is a Nigerian journalist and the current Commissioner for Kaduna State Ministry of Internal Security and Home Affairs.https://www.premiumtimesng.com/regional/nwest/174494-el-rufai- appoints-campaign-spokesperson.html == Education == Aruwan is a graduate of Mass Communication from Kaduna Polytechnic, Kaduna. He attended the African Investigative Journalism training at the University of the Witwatersrand.
